releases.notes: No real changes, just demo for release tool.

name: Wolfenstein 3D Pain Face
description:
Show your level of pain with a Wolfenstein 3D inspired pain face.

 * Use W'bal, heart rate or power output for the pain source.
 * State of the art graphics (for 1992)
 * May induce feelings of nostalgia.
 * Mein Leben!!!

releases.notes:
The only changes to this are the Points Leaderboard.
- better handling of unexpected score format entries
- added an analysis window so you can get a breakdown of how scores were assigned.  It's still a bit crude and I will likely do more work on it but it's functional for now.  You can get to the analysis window from the right click header on the points leaderboard window. From there you can choose any event that you have configured points for.  In racer view you can see how each racer scored on individual segments while in segment view it will show the results for each racer on a segment.  There is a small bug in the segment view where events that are FTS only may show a single 0 point result in FAL and vice versa but it won't affect the actual scoring.  See the attached video for a demo.
- segment results are saved locally for 7 days (previously it was only 1 day) so you can look at the analysis for up to a week.

If you want to be able to get an accurate analysis of FTS and FAL points, it's important to keep the points leaderboard window running and you keep Zwift running and in an activity so that it can update scores that come in after you finish.  You can start a new activity to cooldown post race and it will keep gathering data from the event but if you join another event that will probably stop things.  FIN points are always retrieved live since they are available after the fact but segment results disappear from Zwift fairly quickly so the window needs to get them at the time.

name: Zenmaster
description:
Arend's Mod Collection

* Fully customizable route elevation profiles
* See the active powerups in your group when the HUD is off
* Segment leaderboards
* Preview route and segment profiles
* Pace partner routes and current locations
* Lap data windows for workouts
* Leaderboards for points races
